T02D2091:199a-0: @199a * // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel ba tshul gsum gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs//
T02D2091:199a-2: * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2091:199a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni rang gi
T02D2091:199a-4: ngo bo ni ji lta bu zhig / de'i mtshan
T02D2091:199a-5: ni gang dang gang rnams yin /
T02D2091:199a-6: de yang dag par brjod pa ni ji ltar brjod ce na /
T02D2091:199a-7: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2091:199b-0: de ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi @199b ye shes kyi bdag nyid /
T02D2091:199b-1: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo chos thams cad
T02D2091:199b-2: kyi chos nyid dang tha me dad pa yin te
T02D2091:199b-3: / de'i dbang gis snang ba'i gzugs kyi sku longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2091:199b-5: ye shes kyi rten du snang ba /
T02D2091:199b-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams su
T02D2091:199b-7: theg pa che chung gi tshul sna tshogs las grags
T02D2091:199b-8: par snang ba'i bdag nyid de rnams kyang 'phags pa
T02D2091:199b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D2091:199b-12: shes kyi bdag nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin na
T02D2091:199b-13: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi so
T02D2091:199b-14: so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes rnams chos can
T02D2091:199b-15: gcig gam tha dad pa cig yin /
T02D2091:199b-16: de bzhin du de'i chos nyid dang /
T02D2091:199b-17: de'i mdzad pa yang gcig gam tha dad pa zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2091:199b-18: smras pa de ni 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
T02D2091:199b-19: kha cig gi tshul las ni /
T02D2091:199b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ye shes kyi rgyud kyang tha dad /
T02D2091:199b-21: de'i chos nyid dang de'i mdzad pa yang tha dad de /
T02D2091:199b-22: 'on kyang rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas mtshungs pa yin no //
T02D2091:199b-27: yi ge mtshungs pa'o zhes 'dod do //
T02D2091:199b-28: kha cig gi tshul las ni /
T02D2091:199b-29: ye shes ni gang zag gi rgyud so so las sgrub pa'i phyir tha dad de /
T02D2091:199b-30: de'i chos nyid dang mdzad pa dag ni 'dres pa ste /
T02D2091:199b-31: tha dad pa med do zhes 'dod /
T02D2091:199b-32: kha cig gi tshul las ni /
T02D2091:199b-33: bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud du 'byed pa'i bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags yin la /
T02D2091:199b-34: bdag tu lta ba ni 'khrul pa ste /
T02D2091:199b-35: des bskyed cing de'i dbang gis snang ba ni /
T02D2091:199b-36: de ltar bden pa ma yin la /
T02D2091:199b-37: sems can gyi dus na yang rgyud tha dad mi 'grub na /
T02D2091:199b-38: bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa mi mnga' ba'i sangs
T02D2091:199b-39: rgyas rnams la ye shes tha dad kyi rgyud du
T02D2091:199b-41: de bas na sangs rgyas rnams la ni rgyud tha dad pa dang /
T02D2091:199b-42: rgyud tha dad pas don mdzad pa dang /
T02D2091:199b-43: de bzhin du tshul tha dad pas don mdzad pa dang /
T02D2091:199b-44: zhing tha dad du don mdzad pa dang /
T02D2091:199b-45: dus tha dad du don mdzad pa mi mnga' ste /
T02D2091:199b-46: ji srid du theg pa che chung gi gsung rab
T02D2091:199b-47: rnams las 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes grags pa dang
T02D2091:200a-3: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
T02D2091:200a-8: dkon mchog dpal zhes bya ba la sogs par grags pa /
T02D2091:200a-9: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul /
T02D2091:200a-15: dus tha dad du ye shes chen po'i rten du
T02D2091:200a-16: snang ba thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gnyis su
T02D2091:200a-17: med pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid rtogs pa dbang
T02D2091:200a-18: dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang thugs rje'i shugs
T02D2091:200a-19: kyis gdul bya dkar po'i bag chags dang ldan pa'i
T02D2091:200a-20: dang / blo la / so sor snang tsam gyis phye ba las ma gtogs pa /
T02D2091:200a-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang du ni bye brag phra mo tsam yang rnyed pa ma yin no //
T02D2091:200a-22: de bas na 'dir 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yon
T02D2091:200a-23: tan brjod pa 'di ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi
T02D2091:200a-24: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan brjod pa yin
T02D2091:200a-26: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi skur snang ba'i
T02D2091:200a-27: tshul la brten nas tshul so sor grags pa ni
T02D2091:200a-28: 'di lta ste / nyan thos kyi tshul las ni
T02D2091:200a-29: 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems
T02D2091:200a-31: da dung 'phags pa'i lam ma thob pa so so'i skye bor 'dod do //
T02D2091:200a-32: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul mthun pa 'dzam bu'i
T02D2091:200a-33: gling na yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i 'khor
T02D2091:200a-35: 'og min na yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2091:200a-36: mdzad kyi nye ba'i sras su gyur ba yin zhe'o
T02D2091:200a-37: // mdo sde zab mo'i tshul las ni /
T02D2091:200a-38: sngon gyi dus su sangs rgyas pa ste /
T02D2091:200a-39: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o zhe'o //
T02D2091:200a-40: gsang sngags kyi tshul kha cig las rigs kyi gtso
T02D2091:200a-41: bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor las sprul pa'i
T02D2091:200a-42: bdag nyid byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o
T02D2091:200a-43: zhes 'dod do // rnal 'byor gyi tshul kha cig
T02D2091:200a-44: las ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2091:200a-45: thugs las sprul pa'i ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen
T02D2091:200a-46: po bcu drug las rdo rje rnon po ste 'jam
T02D2091:200a-48: rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul kha cig las ni /
T02D2091:200b-0: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhes kyang @200b bya ;
T02D2091:200b-1: byang sems rdo rje zhes kyang bya /
T02D2091:200b-2: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2091:200b-4: bde ba chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams
T02D2091:200b-5: cad kyi gtso bo dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga'
T02D2091:200b-6: bdag nyid du yang bstan to //
T02D2091:200b-7: 'jam dpal gyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ni de
T02D2091:200b-8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kan 'jam pa'i
T02D2091:200b-10: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gyi tshul dang /
T02D2091:200b-11: ye shes sems dpa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so zhes 'dod do //
T02D2091:200b-12: 'di dag ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bdag nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D2091:200b-13: 'phags pa 'jam dpal de'i mtshan ni gang dang gang
T02D2091:200b-14: rnams yin zhe na ji srid du zag pa dang
T02D2091:200b-16: zag pa med pa'i chos sam /
T02D2091:200b-23: sems sam sems snang pa la sogs te ;
T02D2091:200b-24: ji srid du chos rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba'i ming du grags pa'am /
T02D2091:200b-25: 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag las grags pa'am /
T02D2091:200b-26: theg pa chung ngu las grags pa'am /
T02D2091:200b-27: theg pa chen po las grags pa'am /
T02D2091:200b-28: theg pa chen po'i yang chen po gsang sngags kyi tshul las grags pa yang rung ste /
T02D2091:200b-29: chos rnams kyi ming ji snyed pa de dag thams
T02D2091:200b-30: cad ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan du ma
T02D2091:200b-32: de bas na de dag thams cad mtshan du shes par bya'o //
T02D2091:200b-33: 'dir dris pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi
T02D2091:200b-34: ming rnams ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan du
T02D2091:200b-35: rung ste / 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid zag pa
T02D2091:200b-36: med pa thob pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir rung
T02D2091:200b-37: rung ste / na / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams de'i mtshan du ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D2091:200b-38: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni zag pa'i chos thams cad
T02D2091:200b-39: yongs su zad pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de
T02D2091:200b-40: rnams kyi ming de'i mtshan du mi rung ngo zhe
T02D2091:200b-41: na / 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni zag pa med pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid can yin mod kyi /
T02D2091:200b-43: 'di ltar 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni zag pa dang
T02D2091:200b-44: bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir
T02D2091:200b-45: dang / de la khyab pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-2: de la dga' ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-3: de mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-4: de gsung ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-5: de yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-6: de la mnga' brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-7: de las skyes pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2091:201a-8: tshul bcu po 'di ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan
T02D2091:201a-9: las 'das pa'i chos thams cad yang shes par bya'o
T02D2091:201a-10: // de la ji ltar de chos thams cad rang bzhin nam /
T02D2091:201a-13: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
T02D2091:201a-14: skye med chos te sna tshogs don //
T02D2091:201a-15: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
T02D2091:201a-16: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
T02D2091:201a-17: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
T02D2091:201a-18: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
T02D2091:201a-20: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T02D2091:201a-22: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
T02D2091:201a-24: don grub bsam pa 'grub pa ste //
T02D2091:201a-25: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D2091:201a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'i skabs su bshad pa /
T02D2091:201a-27: dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa'o zhes bshad pa dang /
T02D2091:201a-28: gzhan yang rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can gyi skabs su /
T02D2091:201a-29: sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa snang ba
T02D2091:201a-30: dang bcas pa'i bdag nyid 'jam dpal lo zhes bshad
T02D2091:201a-31: pa dang / de bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi
T02D2091:201a-32: sdug bsngal zhi'i skabs su sdug bsngal gsum ni sdug
T02D2091:201a-34: yang sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal sgrub par byed pa'i kun 'byung du bshad /
T02D2091:201a-36: de dag kyang 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin par bshad pa dang /
T02D2091:201a-37: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i skabs su bdag tu lta ba rnam pa bcu bshad la /
T02D2091:201a-38: yang don ni gnyen po rnam pa bcu bshad de /
T02D2091:201a-39: de ltar na mi mthun pa dang gnyen po de /
T02D2091:201a-40: 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo zhes bshad pa lta bu la sogs pa /
T02D2091:201a-41: chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2091:201a-42: de lta bu yon tan brjod pa'i mi thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2091:201a-43: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na chos thams cad la khyab pa yin zhe na /
T02D2091:201b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
T02D2091:201b-5: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
T02D2091:201b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu ste /
T02D2091:201b-7: de la rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis khyab pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2091:201b-12: de la chos nyid kyis khyab pa ni chos thams
T02D2091:201b-13: cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba bdag med pa
T02D2091:201b-15: chos kyi dbyings ni ma gtogs pa //
T02D2091:201b-16: chos ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
T02D2091:201b-18: de bas na chos kyi dbyings ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal te /
T02D2091:201b-19: de'i phyir thams cad la khyab pa'o //
T02D2091:201b-20: ye shes kyi sgo nas khyab ste /
T02D2091:201b-21: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi chos can ni rang rig pa tsam ste /
T02D2091:201b-22: chos thams cad kyang rang rig pa tsam du 'dus pa dang /
T02D2091:201b-23: ye shes kyi yul du ma gyur ba'i chos nyid kyang med de /
T02D2091:201b-24: de'i phyir ye shes kyi tshul gyis kyang khyab pa'o //
T02D2091:201b-25: thugs rjes kyang bya ba ste /
T02D2091:201b-26: ji ltar dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'brel pa
T02D2091:201b-27: gang na bden thugs rje chen po yang rgyun mi
T02D2091:201b-29: de bzhin du mdzad pas kyang khyab ste /
T02D2091:201b-30: chos de gsum gang du tshogs pa der mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad do //
T02D2091:201b-31: de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dang sems can
T02D2091:201b-32: rnams kyi sems la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis khyab
T02D2091:201b-33: ste / chos de dag gang nas ma 'ongs //
T02D2091:201b-35: gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med bzhin du skal ba dang /
T02D2091:201b-36: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad par nus pa yin no //
T02D2091:201b-37: de lta bu'i yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2091:201b-38: de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na chos
T02D2091:201b-39: thams cad du sbrul pa yin zhe na 'di nyid
T02D2091:201b-40: du gsungs pa / gzugs rnams ma lus snang ba'i dpal //
T02D2091:201b-41: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
T02D2091:201b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar 'gro ba
T02D2091:201b-43: 'dul ba'i dbang gis snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i
T02D2091:201b-44: gzugs sna tshogs su sbrul pa dang /
T02D2091:201b-45: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
T02D2091:201b-46: ral pa mu nydza cod pan thogs //
T02D2091:201b-47: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i skabs su brtul zhugs thams cad 'dzin par sbrul pa dang /
T02D2091:202a-0: @202a * // gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa 'am /
T02D2091:202a-5: skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs pa'am /
T02D2091:202a-6: gzhan yang mdzes pa'i gzugs sam /
T02D2091:202a-9: gzhon pa la sogs pa'i gzugs sam /
T02D2091:202a-10: gzhan yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs sam /
T02D2091:202a-11: zag pa zad pa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad
T02D2091:202a-12: kyi gzugs brnyan du 'phags pa 'jam dpal mi 'phrul
T02D2091:202a-13: pa med do // de bas na de lta bu'i
T02D2091:202a-14: yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan
T02D2091:202a-15: pa med do // du 'gyur ro // de la
T02D2091:202a-16: ji ltar na 'phags pa 'jam dpal de chos thams
T02D2091:202a-17: cad la dga' ba yin zhe na 'di nyid du
T02D2091:202a-18: pa med do // du 'gyur ro // gsungs pa / dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
T02D2091:202a-19: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
T02D2091:202a-20: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
T02D2091:202a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T02D2091:202a-22: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang gis chos thams cad dga' bar ston pa dang /
T02D2091:202a-23: snying rje'i dbang gis srid pa la chags pa'i yid dga' ba dang /
T02D2091:202a-24: shes rab kyi dbang gis stong pa nyid la chags shing dga' ba ste /
T02D2091:202a-25: de bas na de lta bu'i yon tan gyi dbang
T02D2091:202a-26: du gsungs pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du
T02D2091:202a-27: 'gyur ro // de la ji ltar na chos thams cad mkhyen pa yin zhe na /
T02D2091:202a-29: shes rab chen pos skad cig la //
T02D2091:202a-30: chos kun khong du chud pa po //
T02D2091:202a-31: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa po //
T02D2091:202a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad du chos
T02D2091:202a-33: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i dbang du
T02D2091:202a-34: gsungs pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur
T02D2091:202a-35: ro // de la ji ltar na chos thams cad gsungs pa yin zhe na /
T02D2091:202a-37: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
T02D2091:202a-38: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
T02D2091:202a-39: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
T02D2091:202a-40: ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2091:202a-41: ji srid du chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i mnga' bdag yin pas /
T02D2091:202a-42: de'i dbang du smos pa'i chos thams cad kyi ming yang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2091:202a-43: de la ji ltar na de chos thams cad rnam
T02D2091:202b-0: par dag pa'i @202b bdag nyid can yin zhe na
T02D2091:202b-3: sgrib pa las grol ba dang /
T02D2091:202b-4: nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa dang /
T02D2091:202b-6: 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2091:202b-7: chu bo las rgal ba dang /
T02D2091:202b-8: srid rtsa bton pa la sogs pa zag pa dang
T02D2091:202b-9: bcas pa'i chos kyi dri ma dag pa'i sgo nas
T02D2091:202b-10: brjod pa dang / gzhan dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang ba dang /
T02D2091:202b-11: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba /
T02D2091:202b-12: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dag pa dang /
T02D2091:202b-13: shes ba bcu rnam dag 'chang ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2091:202b-14: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang mthar phyin pa'i
T02D2091:202b-15: sgo nas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2091:202b-16: du ston te / de ltar chos thams cad rnam
T02D2091:202b-17: par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa'i ming gang smos
T02D2091:202b-18: pa thams cad de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2091:202b-19: de la ji ltar na de chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug yin zhe na /
T02D2091:202b-21: chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal //
T02D2091:202b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes shing /
T02D2091:202b-23: de la dbang sgyur ba chos kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D2091:202b-25: bdag po ston pa'i sgo nas yon tan brjod pa'i ming thams cad kyang de'i mtshan du 'gyur ro //
T02D2091:202b-26: de la ji ltar na de chos thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na /
T02D2091:202b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2091:202b-29: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa //
T02D2091:202b-30: sna tshogs don kun skyed pa'o //
T02D2091:202b-31: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02D2091:202b-32: la sogs pa'i chos thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal las byung bar ston pa lta bu ste /
T02D2091:202b-33: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad skyed pa yin pa dang /
T02D2091:202b-34: thabs dang shes rab kyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa yin pa dang /
T02D2091:202b-35: 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir sprul pa thams cad skyed pa yin te /

T02D2091:211a-0: @211a * // 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces bya

T02D2091:211a-4: pas / byung ste / bcom ldan 'das don yod

T02D2091:211a-6: su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02D2091:211a-7: rang gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi le lo med par byas te /
T02D2091:211a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang gsal bar byas nas /
T02D2091:211a-9: slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2091:211a-10: po'i phyi rol 'khor lo lnga pa la ji lta
T02D2091:211a-11: ba'i rim par rnam par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2091:211a-12: rigs kyi dbye ba ni 'dir rigs re re bcu dgu yin no //
T02D2091:211a-13: rigs kyi dbye ba 'di ni sprul pa spro ba'i
T02D2091:211a-14: dus na yang 'di lta bu'i dbye ba spro ba
T02D2091:211a-15: yin te / slar bsdus te 'khor lor bkod pa'i dus na yang rigs kyi rim pas gnas pa'o //

T02D2091:211a-17: aom sarba dharm'a la sogs pa'i sngags ni gong du bkod pa nyid do //

T02D2091:211a-28: tshul 'di ni yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam gtan yin te /

T02D2091:216b-26: aee zhes tha snyad btags shing brjod dang bral //
T02D2091:216b-27: sems dang sems ni 'jam dpal ting 'dzin no //
T02D2091:216b-28: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
T02D2091:216b-29: ao aoo zhes pas 'du 'phro 'od zer 'khrug /'ja' tshon rnam pa so so'i yid bzhin sbyor //
T02D2091:216b-30: 'jam dpal rnam par rol pas bde ba che //
T02D2091:216b-31: rnal 'byor chen po ye shes 'byor pa'i dpal //
T02D2091:216b-32: nam mkha' mi dmigs aam zhes ye shes brjod //
T02D2091:216b-33: shes rab ye shes ma 'dres aa: las 'das //
T02D2091:216b-34: stong nyid ci la'ang ma rag lhun gyis grub //
T02D2091:216b-35: don kun 'byor pas blang dor med pa yi //
T02D2091:216b-36: bdag nyid rang bzhin bzhugs dang 'jam dpal nyid //
T02D2091:217a-2: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan brjod par gsungs te /
T02D2091:217a-3: yi ge sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'di'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshig ni //
T02D2091:217a-4: aa gdong nas skye ba med cing 'dus ma byas pas rgyu ma grub pa'i phyir /
T02D2091:217a-5: 'bras bu btsal du med pas gdod ma nas chos kyi sku bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2091:217a-6: ai ni de nyid nam mkha' ltar mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
T02D2091:217a-7: shes rab chen pos de ltar mchod cing mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje 'phro ba dang /
T02D2091:217a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid gdod ma nas yin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2091:217a-9: au ni de pas na kun du bzang po'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin to /
T02D2091:217a-10: 'di ltar mtshan ma dang rtog pa ldang ba la
T02D2091:217a-11: ni dman par mi 'dor mi ldang ba la dang
T02D2091:217a-13: byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang po mtha' las
T02D2091:217a-14: 'das pa che ba'i ngang gis 'gro ba kun kyang
T02D2091:217a-15: bde ba chen po la rang bzhin gyis sbyor ba'o
T02D2091:217a-16: // ae ni de ltar na chos thams cad bsam
T02D2091:217a-17: brjod dang bral zhing g-yo ba med pa la tha
T02D2091:217a-18: snyad med par 'grub pas sems dang sems kyi rang
T02D2091:217a-19: // bzhin no // rnam par rtog pa yang 'phags
T02D2091:217a-20: pa 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'o
T02D2091:217a-21: // bzhin no // // ao ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir na /
T02D2091:217a-22: sems kyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs su snang ba thams
T02D2091:217a-23: cad kyang thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
T02D2091:217a-24: tshogs yin te / nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin du
T02D2091:217a-25: 'gro ba so so'i yid dang mthun pa 'jam dpal
T02D2091:217a-26: rnam par rol pa'i cho 'phrul bde ba chen po
T02D2091:217a-28: aam ni de ltar rnal 'byor ba'i rnal 'byor chen
T02D2091:217a-29: po ye shes dpal thams cad kyi 'byung gnas nam
T02D2091:217a-30: mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2091:217a-31: aa: zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ye shes
T02D2091:217a-32: chos thams cad la rig cing kun las 'das pa
T02D2091:217a-33: ste / de ltar na yi ge bcu gnyis kyi
T02D2091:217a-34: sgo nas 'bags pa 'jam dpal ni chos thams cad
T02D2091:217a-35: gdod ma nas blang dor med par rang bzhin gyis
T02D2091:217a-37: de ltar don thams cad rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid du
T02D2091:217a-38: ye nas gnas bas rnal 'byor ba gang gis chos
T02D2091:217a-39: thams cad de ltar rtogs te /
T02D2091:217a-40: chos 'ga' yang mi gnas mi sems mi len mi 'dor na /
T02D2091:217b-0: @217b 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan brjod pas mnyam pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T02D2091:217b-2: ji ltar sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi //
T02D2091:217b-4: rgyal ba rnams kyi yab dang yum //
T02D2091:217b-5: don gyi mtha' ste shes rab dbyings //
T02D2091:217b-6: gang phyir thabs kyi kun 'byung ba ;
T02D2091:217b-7: / yi ge 'khor lo rnams kyi sgra //
T02D2091:217b-8: sgyu 'phrul dra ba nyid kyi tshul //
T02D2091:217b-9: grag ma thag tu don reg pa //
T02D2091:217b-10: aa a'a zhes pa 'jam dpal nyid //
T02D2091:217b-11: rang bzhin chos kyi sku yi dbyings //
T02D2091:217b-12: ai a'i zhes bya g-yo ba med //
T02D2091:217b-13: mi bskyod pa la yum du gsal //
T02D2091:217b-14: au a'u zhes pas skye ba med //
T02D2091:217b-15: dag pa'i ngang nyid kun du gsal //
T02D2091:217b-16: rgyud las rgyal ba sems dpa' ste //
T02D2091:217b-17: ye shes ngang nyid gcod pa'o //
T02D2091:217b-18: ae aee zhes pa nam mkha' sbyor //
T02D2091:217b-19: 'bras bu med pas rgyu la gnas //
T02D2091:217b-20: de ma thag par gsal ba yi //
T02D2091:217b-22: ao aoo zhes pa ae las 'das //
T02D2091:217b-23: ae zhes gsang sngags thabs chen bstan //
T02D2091:217b-24: ae dang ao yi rang bzhin dbyings //
T02D2091:217b-25: mu ni ngo bo nyid kyi dbyings //
T02D2091:217b-26: aa las rnam par rol pa bston //
T02D2091:217b-27: aom gyis gnyis med 'byor pa yis //
T02D2091:217b-28: zab mo rdo rje ting 'dzin mtha' //
T02D2091:217b-29: ma zhes mnyam dang mi mnyam med //
T02D2091:217b-30: 'jam dpal ye shes rdo rje rdzogs //
T02D2091:217b-33: mi gnas rdo rje rtse mo ste //
T02D2091:217b-34: bsam rtsol sgrub pa med pa yi //
T02D2091:217b-35: dbyings nyid gzhag na yongs su rdzogs //
T02D2091:217b-37: tshul 'di yang snga ma bzhin du yi ge bcu
T02D2091:217b-38: gnyis kyi sgo nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
T02D2091:217b-39: med pa'i rang bzhin du mngon par byang chub pa'i
T02D2091:217b-40: rang bzhin ye nas rtsol sgrub las 'das par sangs
T02D2091:217b-41: rgyas pa'i rang bzhin 'phags pa 'jam dpal yin te
T02D2091:217b-42: / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de lta bu
T02D2091:217b-43: yin pas rnal 'byor can gyis kyang de lta bu'i
T02D2091:217b-45: 'jam dpal gyi yon tan rdzogs zhes bshad do //
T02D2091:217b-46: de yang re zhig yi ge aa a'a ni 'jam dpal chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2091:217b-47: ai a'i ni yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T02D2091:217b-48: au a'u ni byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang mo ste /
T02D2091:217b-49: sems nyid sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2091:217b-50: ae aee ni 'du 'bral med pa'i mkha' la sbyor ba'o //
T02D2091:218a-1: de las 'das te yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen
T02D2091:218a-2: gyi thabs la mkhas pa'i cho 'phrul rang bzhin gyis
T02D2091:218a-3: 'phro ba'o // aam la aam sbyar na aom du 'gyur te /
T02D2091:218a-4: de ni gsang sngags kyi sku'o //
T02D2091:218a-5: aom gyi klad khor ni mum ste /
T02D2091:218a-6: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis grol ba'o //
T02D2091:218a-7: aom ni yon tan thams cad 'byor pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2091:218a-8: glang kor gyi ma ni chos mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam par dbyer med pa ste /
T02D2091:218a-9: 'di lta bu'i don gyi 'jam dpal ye shes rdo
T02D2091:218a-10: rje ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D2091:218a-11: mtha' la mi gnas pa'i ye shes rdo rje rtse
T02D2091:218a-12: mo ste / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de lta bu yin pas /
T02D2091:218a-13: rnal 'byor can gang gis de ltar khong du chud par bya ste /
T02D2091:218a-14: chos thams cad ni bsam par bya ba dang /
T02D2091:218a-16: bsgrub par bya ba thams cad las 'das pa ste /
T02D2091:218a-17: gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa /
T02D2091:218a-19: ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa btsal
T02D2091:218a-20: du med par lhun gyis grub pa 'di lta bu'i
T02D2091:218a-21: rang bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D2091:218a-22: yin pas / 'di lta bu'i ngang la blo bzhag ste /
T02D2091:218a-23: mtshan brjod ji snyed pa yang 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin ston pa sha stag ste /
T02D2091:218a-24: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs su gyur pa /
T02D2091:218a-25: chos nyid kyi rgyan ye shes kyi rol pa /
T02D2091:218a-26: 'gag pa med pa'i cho 'phrul du rtogs pa /
T02D2091:218a-27: blang dor dang rtsol sgrub kyi rtogs pa sa mi g-yo bar brjod par bya'o //
T02D2091:218a-28: brjod pas rdzogs nas kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa /
T02D2091:218a-29: las kyi mtha' yongs su mthong ba'i bsam pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2091:218a-30: mtshan gnyis su med par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2091:218a-31: rnam pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can bstan pa yin
T02D2091:218a-32: no // mtshan tsam rnam par bshad byas pas //
T02D2091:218a-33: gzhung gi spyi bshad rnam par bkod //
T02D2091:218a-34: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2091:218a-35: 'jug sgo tshul tsam shes bya'i phyir //
T02D2091:218a-36: 'jam dpal mtshan bcas brjod tshul bcas //
T02D2091:218a-37: rnam gsum bshad pa tsam byas pa'o //
